ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Mana???
ygData.msgSnippet: Mac you re still around! I haven t seen you in ages.  I think last time I saw you, you were with Halana in unrest tower in your low 20 s (way before kunark).
ygData.messageBody:
Mac you're still around! I haven't seen you in ages. I think last time I
saw you, you were with Halana in unrest tower in your low 20's (way before
kunark).

Glad to see some old faces are still around

Minkin
studio 54 bard
A ro

From: Donny Dane [mailto:ddane01@...]

Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Mana???


hehe, I know several people that never exhaled...or at least, that's the way
they act...

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
The ever 40 bard
Sol Ro Obsidian Fear
